name: guiltlessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without feeling guilty, because you know or feel that you have not done anything wrong: You can guiltlessly delete most of the urgent-looking emails that clutter your inbox. He would guiltlessly tell his children little white lies just so he could avoid talking about complicated matters. Related word
guiltless
More examplesFewer examplesWhen asked where he had been on the night of the murder, he guiltlessly told the police he was at home watching a movie. In the first act of the play, she guiltlessly detaches herself from a married man she has been seeing and takes up with his brother.
